file.name: bundle.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Nabaaang API
  description: Nabaaang API 문서입니다
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:4000'
components:
  schemas:
    Channel:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: auto-increment id
        title:
          type: String
          description: 메시지 내용
        category:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지가 작성된 채팅(채널) id
        description:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
        streamerId:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
        streamerKey:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
        isLive:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
        chat:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: integer
              description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
    Message:
      type: object
      required:
        - content
        - chatId
        - senderId
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: auto-increment id
        content:
          type: String
          description: 메시지 내용
        chatId:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지가 작성된 채팅(채널) id
        senderId:
          type: integer
          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
paths:
  /api/channels:
    get:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: 라이브 방송 조회
      description: channel isLive
      produces:
        - application/json
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  category:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: integer
                        title:
                          type: string
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        category:
                          type: string
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        description:
                          type: string
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        streamerId:
                          type: integer
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        streamerKey:
                          type: string
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        isLive:
                          type: boolean
                          description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                        streamer:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            nickname:
                              type: string
                              description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
                            imageUrl:
                              type: string
                              description: 메시지를 작성한 유저 id
        '204':
          description: 컨텐츠가 없음
          content: null
        '500':
          description: 서버 에러
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
              example:
                error: Internal Server Error
                message: error message
    post:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: 방송 생성
      description: Channel 생성
      produces:
        - application/json
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: token
          in: header
          required: true
          description: access 및 refresh token
        - in: body
          name: channelInfo
          description: 채널 생성 정보
          schema:
            type: object
            required:
              - userId
              - title
              - category
              - description
            properties:
              userId:
                type: integer
              title:
                type: string
              category:
                type: string
              description:
                type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                channelId: 1
        '401':
          description: 해당 리소스에 유효한 인증 정보가 없음.
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                error: TOKEN IS INVALID
        '500':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/500'
  '/api/channels/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: Channel 조회
      description: channel id로 채널 정보 조회
      produces:
        - application/json
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: id
          required: true
          description: 방송 id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                id: 1
                title: 황금 올리브 먹방 시작합니다.
                category: 먹방
                description: 황금 올리브 4마리 + 치즈볼
                streamerId: 1
                streamKey: 1asdqw1
                isLive: true
                chat:
                  id: 1
                streamer:
                  nickname: test
                  imageUrl: 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AATXAJx8G_3hTwJUKgnMGM2mO8wS1-v3lM97vqEc_7UyUA=s96-c'
        '204':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/204'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/500'
  '/api/channels/{id}/authenticate':
    get:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: Channel 및 사용자 권한 조회
      description: channel id로 채널 정보 및 사용자 권한 조회
      produces:
        - application/json
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: 방송 id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                id: 1
                title: 황금 올리브 먹방 시작합니다.
                category: 먹방
                description: 황금 올리브 4마리 + 치즈볼
                streamerId: 1
                streamKey: 1asdqw1
                isLive: true
                chat:
                  id: 1
                streamer:
                  nickname: test
                  imageUrl: 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AATXAJx8G_3hTwJUKgnMGM2mO8wS1-v3lM97vqEc_7UyUA=s96-c'
                role: ROLE_GUEST
        '204':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/204'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/post/responses/401'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/500'
  '/api/channels/{id}/open':
    patch:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: 방송 open
      description: Channel 라이브 상태(isLive) true로 변경
      produces:
        - application/json
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: 방송 id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                message: success
        '500':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/500'
  '/api/channels/{id}/close':
    patch:
      tags:
        - Channel
      summary: 방송 close
      description: Channel 라이브 상태(isLive) false 변경
      produces:
        - application/json
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: 방송 id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                message: success
        '500':
          $ref: '#/paths/~1api~1channels/get/responses/500'
  components: null
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "Channel": resolve "#/components/schemas/Channel": property "title": at backend/swagger/build/bundle.yaml:17:17: type: unexpected schema type: "String"
